Address.label: Address
Address.value: 11 HARBOR PARK DRIVE, PORT WASHINGTON, New York, 11050, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Global Industrial Co is a value-added industrial distributor. It distributes a wide range of industrial and maintenance, repair, and operations (MRO) products to customers across North America, including storage and shelving, material handling, janitorial and maintenance, safety and security, furniture and office, HVAC/R and fans, workbenches, and shop desks, outdoor and grounds maintenance, plumbing and pumps, and packaging and supplies.

value.name: Manoj Shetty
value.title: Chief Information Officer & Senior Vice President
